title: Online Exam Proctoring and Academic Integrity Maintenance Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term course for undergraduate science students to master academic integrity strategies, focusing on online proctoring tools. Requires mobile-optimized instructional design for students without PCs.

learning_goals: Core functions of online proctoring tools (e.g., real-time recording, AI anomaly detection) can be explained and applied case studies analyzed
Propose at least three alternative assessment strategies to maintain academic integrity using mobile devices in restricted technological environments
Identify legal and ethical issues (e.g., privacy concerns) that may arise when implementing online proctoring systems and develop mitigation plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
